title: Hidden Treasures
description: The internet's best-kept secrets. Powerful tools and hidden gems that insiders use but rarely share. Welcome to the underground.

sections.title: üîê Power User Secrets

resources.name: Ray.so
resources.description: Create beautiful code images with customizable themes, backgrounds, and syntax highlighting
